src:
Diincar Juventus, Wonderkid MU ini Berpotensi Pergi
03 Nov 2019, 05:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah kabar buruk datang bagi Manchester United. Winger muda mereka, Tahith Chong diberitakan membuka diri untuk bergabung dengan Juventus di tahun depan.
Chong merupakan salah satu pemain muda yang diorbitkan oleh Ole Gunnar Solskjaer. Winger berusia 19 tahun itu mendapatkan cukup banyak kesempatan di skuat United.
Bakat pemain asal Belanda itu diberitakan menarik perhatian Juventus. Juara Serie A itu dirumorkan tertarik memboyong sang winger ke Turin.
Ketika dikonfirmasi kabar ini, agen Chong tidak membantah. "Memang benar ada beberapa klub top yang mengamati situasi di sekitar Tahith," ujar Erkan Alkan kepada Voetbal International.

Baca komentar lengkap agen Chong itu di bawah ini.
text:
Targeted by Juventus, this MU Wonderkid has the potential to leave
Nov 3 2019, 5:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A bad news comes for Manchester United. Their young winger, Tahith Chong is reported to open up to join Juventus next year.
Chong is one of the young players orbited by Ole Gunnar Solskjaer. The 19-year-old winger had enough chances in United's squad.
The talent of the Dutchman was reportedly attracted the attention of Juventus. The Serie A champions are rumored to be interested in bringing the winger to Turin.
When confirmed this news, agent Chong did not argue. "It is true that there are a number of top clubs watching the situation around Tahith," Erkan Alkan told Voetbal International.

Read Agent Chong's full comment below.
